titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-286, by Ms. Slaughter.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 97.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 633, H. Res. 595 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: 8/1/2007--Reported to House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendars and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of H.R. 3161 (Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2008) on the same day it is presented to the House.
